snippet.title: SYNDUALITY Echo of Ada – Customization Trailer
snippet.description:
Become a Drifter and pilot your CRADLECOFFIN to scavenge and survive – joined by A.I. partners known as Magus – in the upcoming sci-fi extraction shooter SYNDUALITY Echo of Ada!

Players can make their ideal Magus partner by choosing a support style and delving into tons of options for physical appearances and outfits.

Equip your CRADLECOFFIN with various powerful weapon loadouts and parts to fight off vicious creatures and other players!

Follow SYNDUALITY Echo of Ada:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/synduality
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/synduality

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
